title: Matrix Metrics
text:
Mission statement
We believe ecological and social systems are critically interconnected in the landscape. In agroecology, the places in the landscape where people and nature interact is called the matrix. We are committed to using our expertise to find solutions that are responsive to local communities, support people’s needs, and restore of natural systems.
Matrix Metrics is a limited liability company.

title: Kevin Li
text:
Kevin is a landscape- and agro-ecologist who is also trained in landscape architecture. He uses his unique background to take a data-driven approach to sustainable design. His work aims to make environmental data accessible and actionable for communities and decision makers. He has expertise in geospatial information systems (GIS), statistical analysis, and data visualization, as well as hands-on ecological restoration, stewardship, and landscape design.
Through his research and community work, Dr. Li is dedicated to creating landscapes that meet human and ecological needs and foster resilient communities for people and nature.
